MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut affecting the ML8 postcode area of Carluke. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 10.30am. Our engineers have now arrived on site and the team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 1.30pm. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11.42am on Thursday 12th November 2020.
